panels.description:
* 168 = the SLO (2 minutes 48 seconds) in seconds
*  (sum(count_over_time((probe_success{probe="Private Probe"} == 0)[30d:])) == How many failed probes where there in the last 30 days
* / 7 == there are 7 services so normalise it back down to a service perspective
* 10 == the synthetic monitoring checks run every 10 seconds so this takes the above everything which is how many windows failed and converts that to seconds
panels.title: Budget Remaining

panels.description:
* 168 = the SLO (2 minutes 48 seconds) in seconds
*  (sum(count_over_time((probe_success{probe="Private Probe"} == 0)[30d:])) == How many failed probes where there in the last 30 days
* / 7 == there are 7 services so normalise it back down to a service perspective
* 10 == the synthetic monitoring checks run every 10 seconds so this takes the above everything which is how many windows failed and converts that to seconds
panels.title: Budget Remaining

targets.expr: 500 - sum(count_over_time({service="payment"} | logfmt | endpoint = `/process` | status != `200` [30d])) or vector(500)

(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{service_name="product"}[1m])) by (le)) * 1) > bool 2000 or (probe_success{job="ecommerce-product"}) == bool 0 or {name="ProductDBErrors"} > bool 0

(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{service_name="payment"}[1m])) by (le)) * 1) > bool 2000  or (probe_success{job="ecommerce-payment"}) == bool 0 or sum_over_time(PaymentProcessErrors1m[1m]) > bool 0
